meanings.definition: The quality or state of being ultimate.
meanings.sent1: Her ultimateness in the competition was evident from her exceptional skills.
meanings.sent2: The ultimateness of his decision left no room for doubt.
meanings.sent3: The cat's ultimateness in catching mice made it the hero of the house.
meanings.sent4: The ultimateness of the storm's fury shook the entire town.
meanings.sent5: The ultimateness of the mountain peak took their breath away.

meanings.definition: The highest or most extreme degree of something.
meanings.sent1: The ultimateness of her happiness was contagious.
meanings.sent2: His ultimateness in speed made him the champion of the race.
meanings.sent3: The cake's ultimateness in sweetness made everyone crave more.
meanings.sent4: The ultimateness of the heatwave was unbearable.
meanings.sent5: The ultimateness of the fireworks display lit up the night sky.

meanings.definition: The final or eventual outcome or result.
meanings.sent1: The ultimateness of the negotiation was a win-win situation for both parties.
meanings.sent2: His ultimateness in achieving success was commendable.
meanings.sent3: The ultimateness of the movie's plot twist left everyone in awe.
meanings.sent4: The ultimateness of the experiment's findings surprised the researchers.
meanings.sent5: The ultimateness of the surprise party brought tears of joy to her eyes.
